mapper.sql: adGroupId, campaignId, keywordId, keywordText, matchType, bid, state, profileid, campaignType, opttime
mapper.insert:
replace into t_amz_adv_keywords_hsa ( campaignId, keywordId, adGroupId, keywordText, matchType, campaignType,bid, state, profileid, opttime) values
( #{adv.campaignid,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{adv.keywordid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.adgroupid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.keywordtext,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.matchtype,jdbcType=CHAR},#{adv.campaigntype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{adv.bid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{adv.state,jdbcType=CHAR},#{adv.profileid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adv.opttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
